Hortencia A. Ramírez Vázquez

I’m a MSc in Computer Science student @Tecnológico de Monterrey.

My academic path has been fueled by an insatiable curiosity and a constant eagerness to learn about various robotics-related topics. I’m a passionate about research and development.
